column5: The MSc in Biodiversity and Conservation Management at Aberystwyth University meets the needs of future environmental professionals and attracts students from around the world. The course is research- and practice-led, and provides a sound overview of the theoretical background of biodiversity and conservation science. This Masters degree is ideal for those wanting to pursue postgraduate studies in the fields of biodiversity, environmental science and conservation. It is also suitable for those already working in these sectors who want to obtain further relevant qualifications or for those working in other fields who wish to pursue this line of work.This course is available for September 2023 entry.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
column9: 1 year full time, 2 years part time
